BubaChain

A zen idle game where time turns into progress. Earn BubaCoins (BC), upgrade your miner, and unleash powerful Storms.

How it works

  • Keep the app active to generate Unclaimed BC.
  • Watch a short Ad to unlock Claim.
  • Buy upgrades to increase your mining rate.
  • Storms are rare and powerful: big boosts + epic visuals.

BubaCoins (BC) are in-game reward points with no guaranteed monetary value.
